title: Anyone else lagging for no reason?
body:
I've just started playing league again, and i noticed that my ping has been spiking pretty hard (500-600). So whilst i've been lagging i've done multiple speedtests via speedtest.net and i've got 9mbps and 13ms. I also recently reformatted my pc so the cause can't be viruses. Is rito the cause?

p.s my ping when not lagging is around 75 which im okay with.

replies.body: Did you disable your OS's automatic updates?
